description:
Chief Nurse Pururu is leaving the platoon and Pekopon for a new, distant outpost. Will Warrant Officer Bariri be able to share his feelings for her before she goes? Then Alisa and Momoka compete with each other in an icy obstacle course. The prize: a vacation with Fuyuki in Hokkaido!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pururu, Pekopon Love Tour / Alisa & Momoka, Women`s Battle
プルル めぐり愛ペコポン であります / アリサ&桃華 女の戦い であります
